Hi, my name is

Dmitry Silantiev

I’m a interective and UX designer located in Kyiv, Ukraine. I working as lead designer at Aimbulance.

I’m ready to take on board new projects, so if you need any help or have interesting projects please get in touch. Some of my work can be seen at behance and dribbble.

Learn more about me by visiting any of these links: Facebook, Google+ and Twitter.
